title: Grace Lee Boggs Lecture is 5:30 p.m., Tuesday, Oct. 6 (University of Detroit Mercy)
text: ( Source : University of Detroit Mercy ) Civil rights pioneer, activist and writer Grace Lee Boggs , who died Monday at the age of 100 in her Detroit home , is the subject of a lecture at 5:30 p.m. today at University of Detroit Mercy. 'The
